publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-3536 Ms Margaret Curran on behalf of the Parliamentary Bureau: Environmental Assessment (Scotland) Bill—That the Parliament agrees that, during Stage 3 of the Environmental Assessment (Scotland) Bill, debate on groups of amendments shall, subject to Rule 9.8.4A, be brought to a conclusion by the time limits indicated (each time limit being calculated from when the Stage begins and excluding any periods when other business is under consideration or when the meeting of the parliament is suspended (other than a suspension following the first division in the Stage being called) or otherwise not in progress): Groups 1 and 2 – 20 minutes Groups 3 and 4 – 50 minutes Groups 5 to 7 – 1 hour and 15 minutes Groups 8 to 10 – 1 hour and 40 minutes. Supported by: George Lyon*
